docs.text: Welcome to Emofy Docs! This docs contain all the explanations of the bot commands along with examples on how to use them. Emofy Invite | Support | Status | Patreon Bot Prefixes 1 . e! 2 . @Emofy ( Bot mention Emofy#7863 ) Important You can not change the bot prefix . Need Help Join our discord server . Found A Bug? You find a Bug ? or any Problem ? Report it, in our Discord Server .
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Emofy Invite | Support | Status | Patreon Bot Prefixes 1 . e! 2 . @Emofy ( Bot mention Emofy#7863 ) Important You can not change the bot prefix . Need Help Join our discord server . Found A Bug? You find a Bug ? or any Problem ? Report it, in our Discord Server .
docs.title: This docs contain all the explanations of the bot commands along with examples on how to use them.

docs.text: Basic Commands. • Ping Ping Gives you bot ping . Usage : e!ping • Avatar Avatar Gives you avatar of mention user. Usage : e!avatar <mention> Aliases : avatar , av , pfp Important You need to mention someone to get his avatar. If you want avatar of yourself, you need to mention yourself. • Stats Stats Gives you current bot stats. Usage : e!stats
docs.title: Basic

docs.text: Ping Gives you bot ping . Usage : e!ping
docs.title: • Ping

docs.text: Avatar Gives you avatar of mention user. Usage : e!avatar <mention> Aliases : avatar , av , pfp Important You need to mention someone to get his avatar. If you want avatar of yourself, you need to mention yourself.
docs.title: • Avatar

docs.text: Stats Gives you current bot stats. Usage : e!stats
docs.title: • Stats

docs.text: Emoji Commands. • Enlarge Emoji Enlarge Emoji Enlarge the given emoji. Usage : e!view <server-emoji> • Add Emoji Add Emoji Add emoji from another server. Usage : e!addemoji <server-emoji> Aliases : steal Important Required Permission : MANAGE_EMOJIS • Add Custom Emoji Add Custom Emoji Add emoji from media link. Usage : e!addcustom <media-link> <name> Aliases : custom , ac Important Required Permission : MANAGE_EMOJIS Emoji names must be at least 2 characters long and can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores . Media must end with .png , .jpeg , .jpg & .gif . The size should be less then 256kb . • Delete Emoji Delete Emoji Delete emoji from server. Usage : e!deleteemoji <server-emoji> Aliases : de , removeemoji , delemoji Important Required Permission : MANAGE_EMOJIS • Mass Add Mass Add Add multiple emoji at once. ( 3 ) Usage : e!massadd <emoji_1> <emoji_2> <emoji_3> Aliases : ma Important Required Permission : MANAGE_EMOJIS • Steal With Custom Name Steal w/ Custom Name Add emoji with custom name . Usage : e!swcn <server-emoji> name Aliases : stealemojiwithcustomname Important Required Permission : MANAGE_EMOJIS • Check Check Chech emoji slot left or not. Usage : e!check
docs.title: Emoji

docs.text: Enlarge Emoji Enlarge the given emoji. Usage : e!view <server-emoji>
docs.title: • Enlarge Emoji

docs.text: Add Emoji Add emoji from another server. Usage : e!addemoji <server-emoji> Aliases : steal Important Required Permission : MANAGE_EMOJIS
docs.title: • Add Emoji

docs.text: Add Custom Emoji Add emoji from media link. Usage : e!addcustom <media-link> <name> Aliases : custom , ac Important Required Permission : MANAGE_EMOJIS Emoji names must be at least 2 characters long and can only contain alphanumeric characters and underscores . Media must end with .png , .jpeg , .jpg & .gif . The size should be less then 256kb .
docs.title: • Add Custom Emoji

docs.text: Delete Emoji Delete emoji from server. Usage : e!deleteemoji <server-emoji> Aliases : de , removeemoji , delemoji Important Required Permission : MANAGE_EMOJIS
docs.title: • Delete Emoji

docs.text: Mass Add Add multiple emoji at once. ( 3 ) Usage : e!massadd <emoji_1> <emoji_2> <emoji_3> Aliases : ma Important Required Permission : MANAGE_EMOJIS
docs.title: • Mass Add

docs.text: Steal w/ Custom Name Add emoji with custom name . Usage : e!swcn <server-emoji> name Aliases : stealemojiwithcustomname Important Required Permission : MANAGE_EMOJIS
docs.title: • Steal With Custom Name

docs.text: Check Chech emoji slot left or not. Usage : e!check
docs.title: • Check

docs.text: Emofy Pack Commands. • View Pack View Pack Command to view emoji pack with pack-id. Usage : e!view-<pack-id> • Add Pack Add Pack Command to add emoji pack with pack-id. Usage : e!add-<pack-id> Important Required Permission : MANAGE_EMOJIS
